actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Resolution directing the Director of the Secret Service to furnish information concerning the expenditure of Federal funds for administrative support and personnel at or near private residences of certain Presidents of the United States.

summary.text: Directs the Director of the Secret Service to furnish information concerning the expenditure of Federal funds for administrative support and personnel at or near the private residences of (1) Franklin D. Roosevelt, (2) Harry S. Truman, (3) Dwight D. Eisenhower, (4) John F. Kennedy, and (5) Lyndon B. Johnson during their terms as President and Vice President.

titles.title: Resolution directing the Director of the Secret Service to furnish information concerning the expenditure of Federal funds for administrative support and personnel at or near private residences of certain Presidents of the United States.
